story:
LegacyPop Preview

 

Collaborate with Robert Sabuda and Chuck Fischer to create a one-of-a-kind architectural pop-up card of YOUR COLLEGE CAMPUS BUILDING or HISTORIC HOUSE. 

This is our featured PERK and is being offered for a limited time.

Intricate details, state-of-the-art engineering, and hand-made craftsmanship are the hallmarks of LegacyPop.  Experience iconic architectural masterpieces as you’ve never seen them before, in the palm of your hand.  We’ll even design and build a customized pop-up of your own home! 

At the helm of LegacyPop is artist and designer Chuck Fischer and

#1 New York Times best-selling 3D book creator, Robert Sabuda.

It won't come as a surprise to anyone who knows us, that we are passionate about pop-ups, but we also share a love of architecture, especially historic architecture.  This past summer, while talking about our work and what kind of projects we'd like to work on in the future, we discovered we both we thinking about starting a company with a focus on architectural pop-up cards and bespoke, one-of-a-kind 3D pop-ups of private homes. We immediately decided to join forces and start creating 3D prototypes to launch a crowd-funding campaign. We're super excited about making our dream a reality, and thanks to everyone who has supported LegacyPop we've surpassed our goal.

All listed PERKS are available to purchase!

Supporters at $75 and above receive a limited edition pop-up thank you

card created and signed by Chuck and Robert.

We're currently offering these historic buildings, colleges and universities: 

 

   • Card dimensions - 5.75 in. (146mm) x 7.75 in. (178mm)  • White envelope included with cards

   • Cloth bound, Special Edition dimensions - 8.75 in (222mm) x 11.25 in. (286mm)

Help us reach as many friends and lovers of historic architecture

and pop-up design as possible!

Send us an email and let us know if you don't see your favorite historic property or college or university and we will do our best to add it to the LegacyPop collection.

Help us spread the word about LegacyPop!  

Please share the link to our Indiegogo campaign on all of your social media platforms!          

Tradition with a Twist

We've been designing finely detailed laser-cut covers and amazingly intricate 3D architectural pop-ups to launch LegacyPop and we would love to share them with you.

Highclere Castle as seen on Downton Abbey

Clark Hall - University of Alabama

Nassau Hall - Princeton University

The White House

Biltmore Estate

Founders Library - Howard University

Thomas Jefferson's Monticello

Royce Hall - UCLA

Special Edition Pop-Ups

We've also designed large format 8.75 in (222mm) x 11.25 in. (286mm) Special Edition Pop-Ups.  Each Special Edition is hand made with finely woven cloth-bound hard covers in a variety of colors.  The cover has an embossed window featuring a tipped in, full-color giclee print of an original watercolor of the building by Chuck Fischer. Included inside are the Legacy's history as well as a detailed architectural line drawing of the facade.

Highclere Castle as seen on Downton Abbey

Each Special Edition is signed by Chuck Fischer and Robert Sabuda.

The Lyceum - University of Mississippi

A Pop-Up of Your Own Home

We love the challenge of starting from scratch and creating an original architectural pop-up of your own home, fraternity or sorority house, or historic property.  Just send us pictures or plans of your very own Legacy building and let us do the rest!

Each Special Edition Pop-Up includes a giclee print of an original painting created by            

Chuck Fischer exclusively for LegacyPop. 

Special Events and Promotions

If you're buying a quantity of cards for a special event or promotion we are happy to accommodate you to include your original text and to customize the pop-up design.
story_txt:
LegacyPop Preview Collaborate with Robert Sabuda and Chuck Fischer to create a one-of-a-kind architectural pop-up card of YOUR COLLEGE CAMPUS BUILDING or HISTORIC HOUSE. 
This is our featured PERK and is being offered for a limited time.

Intricate details, state-of-the-art engineering, and hand-made craftsmanship are the hallmarks of LegacyPop.  Experience iconic architectural masterpieces as you’ve never seen them before, in the palm of your hand.  We’ll even design and build a customized pop-up of your own home! 

At the helm of LegacyPop is artist and designer Chuck Fischer and
#1 New York Times best-selling 3D book creator, Robert Sabuda.
It won't come as a surprise to anyone who knows us, that we are passionate about pop-ups, but we also share a love of architecture, especially historic architecture.  This past summer, while talking about our work and what kind of projects we'd like to work on in the future, we discovered we both we thinking about starting a company with a focus on architectural pop-up cards and bespoke, one-of-a-kind 3D pop-ups of private homes. We immediately decided to join forces and start creating 3D prototypes to launch a crowd-funding campaign. We're super excited about making our dream a reality, and thanks to everyone who has supported LegacyPop we've surpassed our goal.
All listed PERKS are available to purchase!


Supporters at $75 and above receive a limited edition pop-up thank you 
card created and signed by Chuck and Robert.
We're currently offering these historic buildings, colleges and universities:  

 
   • Card dimensions - 5.75 in. (146mm) x 7.75 in. (178mm)  • White envelope included with cards
   • Cloth bound, Special Edition dimensions - 8.75 in (222mm) x 11.25 in. (286mm)

Help us reach as many friends and lovers of historic architecture 
and pop-up design as possible!

story:
¿Qué?

Viaje a la fantasía te guiará por el mundo entero en una narración llena de emoción y fantasía.

Mario empleado administrativo de un hospital, a la hora de salir se le acerca uno de los pacientes ahí internado, quien le dice que le lleve a la casa de un conocido. Tratando de engañarle dando vueltas por el hospital le amenaza con un cuchillo. La búsqueda de esa persona por parte del enfermo es que puede transportarse con la mente y lograr conocer los pensamientos de los demás, lo que le permite conocer el asesino de la esposa del embajador de Italia  así como de las diferentes acciones deshonestas que realiza.

Por otro lado la posibilidad de conocer los pensamientos de los demás tiene la posibilidad de tratar de salvar al mundo de la invasión que se avecina. Historia que se desarrolla en África y Europa poniendo de manifiesto las diferentes culturas y actitudes de las personas que habitan en esos lugares.                                      

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para valorar la aceptación y viabilidad de cada título.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Roberth Flavison.

Nacido en América del Norte, descendiente de españoles, realiza estudios de Medicina y la especialidad en Oftalmología, lo que le permite viajar por diferentes partes del mundo realizando ayuda humanitaria tanto de América como de África y desempeñando su profesión en España, Portugal y Francia, lo que le permite ver otras culturas, medios de vida y le da la posibilidad de transmitir esas experiencias en textos legibles para que se llegue a conocer realmente lo que ha visto y vivido en esos lugares.

¿Por qué?

Por aquí un fragmento del texto como muestra:

«—Entonces...
     —¿Por qué estoy en el hospital?
     —Sí.
     —Porque es la única manera de localizar a mi amigo Ylunga para que termine de proporcionarme los secretos de las vitrakas y llegar a ser como ellos.
     —¿Exactamente, que es eso de vitrakas?
     —La capacidad de lograr hacer desaparecer tu cuerpo y dominarlo con el poder de tu mente, mediante la tradición de los kimbundos.
     —¿De los qué?
     —Los kimbundos, una tribu que existe en uno de los países que he visitado y de los que he aprendido muchas cosas, aunque no sólo de ellos sino también de los umbundos, los congoleses, los masawis, los marfileños y otros muchos sin dejar de mencionar a los okeboars sudafricanos.
     —¿Y qué ganarías con eso?
     —Sabes, tengo un poco de hambre. ¿No sientes tú lo mismo? 
     —En efecto, yo también tengo hambre, pero además deberíamos ir a conseguir un poco de comida también para mi hermano que, por cierto, no tardará en llegar y no me gustaría que te encontrara aquí.
     —¿Por qué?
     —No lo entenderías. Es un poco maniático con todos aquéllos que no son como él y sobre todo si vienen de otro país. No es que sea racista pero no permite que nadie visite la casa si no se le ha informado adecuadamente de quien es la persona que va a venir. No quisiera que te encontrara y tuviera un altercado con él.
     Está hablando aun cuando, en ese momento, se abre la puerta y aparece, con una gran voz la figura del hermano de Mario. Se gira para ver qué es lo que hace Richard cuando se da cuenta de que ya ha desaparecido, justo en el instante en que aparece frente a él Esteban.
     —Hola, ¿qué tal te va? Hace días que quería hablar contigo respecto de lo que debe haber o no en la nevera, ¿sabes? Ayer llegué con unos amigos para estudiar un rato y estaba completamente vacía.
     —¡No lo entiendo! La dejé llena anteayer.
     —Seguramente, te habrás traído solo una parte de lo que normalmente compras porque te digo que no hay absolutamente nada.
     —¿Estás seguro?
     —¿Crees que estoy borracho o qué?
     Dirigiéndose Mario a la cocina, ve que la nevera está completamente llena.
     —Mira, Esteban, no estoy para bromas, ¡vale! Si necesitas ir al médico para que te ponga gafas vas, y asunto solucionado. La nevera está llena, ¿vale?».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 840€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán como ayuda para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Viaje a la fantasía que saldría después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Roberth Flavison vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
Story of My Book

Female Empowered Fashion is about the ways in which fashion promotes female empowerment. This includes how fashion has been used to promote inclusivity in body image, build supportive and educational programs for girls, and show how young women have broken into the industry and gained success. It includes insights, tactics, and solutions from industry CEOs, VPs, stylists, designers, and influencers.

My name is Ariana Dimitrakis and I am the author of Female Empowered Fashion. I wrote this book because these are two topics that I am passionate about. I believe they are relevant and important to society today, so I thought it would be interesting to put them together and see how they are affecting each other.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that the fashion industry does promote female empowerment. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for fashion in you. And then ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you understand ways to break into the industry, rise to high-ranking positions, and support the movement to empower girls.

In this book, you'll learn about how fashion promotes female empowerment:

  • Women, with or without prior industry knowledge, break into the fashion industry and build successful careers.
  • Women use their positions in the industry to create scholarships and programs for girls.
  • From magazines to the runway, the fashion industry promotes inclusivity and body image positivity for girls.

 

You will love this book if you are a young woman who is interested in fashion and wants to hear the different perspectives and insights on fashion and female empowerment from strong female figures of the industry.

 

The Book - Female Empowered Fashion

The book is written in 3 parts....

  • Part 1 contains the introduction + an additional chapter. This includes the history of the fashion industry in relation to female empowerment. It touches on how style has changed over time, gender inequality in terms of employment, and how the media has impacted inclusivity.
  • Part 2 contains Chapters 2-8. This includes insights from women who have broken into the industry and risen to high ranking positions. It also shares stories of women who use their positions to empower young girls through the creation of campaigns, programs, rewards and networking platforms. Additionally, it offers perspectives on gender and body image inclusivity.
  • Part 3 contains Chapter 9. This reflects on the information in previous chapters and gathers perspectives from sources interviewed to suggest solutions for the fashion industry to promote more girls in the future.
     

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in July, 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this summer.

 

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • A signed paperback edition
  • Early access to the Introduction of my book
  • Help me pick my book cover
  • Your name will appear in my Acknowledgements
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Ariana Dimitrakis is a sophomore at Lehigh University majoring in journalism with a double minor in marketing and graphic design. She is the deputy lifestyle editor of Lehigh’s student-run publication, The Brown and White, and the campus editor-at-large from Lehigh for Thrive Global.

I wrote this book because I am passionate about both fashion and female empowerment, and I wanted to explore how they affect each other. Most people believe that fashion hinders female empowerment, but I wanted to highlight all of the ways that fashion is actually promoting it.

My interest in fashion comes from my love for clothes, the fashion design classes I took in high school, and the fashion blog I write in my free time. This industry is one that I aspire to grow a career in, and the different perspectives from female figures analyzed in this book will provide insights to young women with the same goal.

For more information you can connect with Ariana at arianadimitrakis@gmail.com and arianadimitrakis on Instagram.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #FemaleEmpoweredFashion and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Ariana Dimitrakis

story:
Story of My Book

Of Thrones and Thieves is the story of a lost, unsure princess named Elara who goes on a journey both externally and internally to find herself and discover who she is. As she is stolen from everything that she knows, she is forced to overcome her own anxiety and learn to become the queen she was meant to be against all odds.

My name is Jaelynn Hart and I am the author of Of Thrones and Thieves. I wrote this book because, as a lesbian woman, I don’t often see myself reflected in the heroes of most stories. For example, in Percy Jackson, Harry Potter, and The Hunger Games, there are these fantastical stories of heroes and heroines — and none of them look like me. Percy falls for Annabeth, Harry has Ginny, and Katniss finds Peeta. I made this book so that, just once, I could be the hero, because I believe representation is important. If I had picked up Harry Potter at eleven years old and Hermione had fallen in love with Luna Lovegood instead of Ron Weasley, I wouldn’t have struggled the way I did with my own identity. So my stories are for the young girls that need to see a hero that looks like them — you’re just as extraordinary as anybody else.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will find yourself between the pages. This is a story about discovering who you are and learning to love yourself along the way. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to escape from a world of prejudice and learn alongside Elara — to find yourself and realize that it doesn’t matter who you love or what you look like. We’re all capable of being the hero in our own stories.

You’ll follow Princess Elara of Metanoia as she is kidnapped on the day of her coronation. Unsure if she is even fit to take over her mother’s place as Queen, Princess Elara finds herself completely in over her head with her new situation as pandemonium breaks out over her castle. She is whisked away from her home and everything she knows, taken aboard a ship of pirates hired to kidnap her by a mysterious third party whose identity is kept a secret. Princess Elara is unwilling to admit defeat, however, and will do whatever she can to escape her captors, even if it means battling the pirate captain, Kai, herself. As tensions rise, it becomes clear to Elara that these pirates aren’t what they seem to be; their secrets are hidden behind tight lips, and the princess finds herself drawn to their mystery — especially that of Captain Kai. As answers force their way to the surface, Elara realizes she must choose between two sides — will she hold loyalty to her kingdom, or will she be drawn in by the sudden, surprising freedom she’s been granted as a prisoner?

You will love this book if you love enemies-to-lovers stories, enjoy fantasy fiction about pirates, or want to see strong heroines conquer their stories. Of Thrones and Thieves speaks to the LGBT+ community and women who want to grapple with strong heroines and lesbian romances in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that Of Thrones and Thieves inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • Why do so many LGBT+ fiction books focus on coming out, rather than on us as people?
  • How does familial pressure affect your ability to believe in yourself and your position?
  • Is it easier to find yourself when you’re surrounded by people similar to you?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing finding your identity and learning to trust yourself will change us all for the better.
 

The Book - Of Thrones and Thieves

The book is written in 4 parts.

Part 1 contains the author’s note + chapters 1-3. In these chapters, you will meet our main character, Princess Elara. She is preparing for her coronation, yet we learn quickly that she doesn’t feel ready to be queen as her mother steps down. On the day of her coronation, pandemonium breaks out in Metanoia and Princess Elara is kidnapped by a band of pirates. The finale of part 1 is where we meet her companion, Captain Kai.

Part 2 contains chapters 4-9. Here, we see Princess Elara struggling with life on the pirate ship. She is trying to find answers and a way to escape, but to no avail. Here, she makes a few alliances.

Part 3 contains chapters 10-13. In this part, the princess is finally starting to get her sea legs and has found her place among the crew when disaster strikes that sweeps her feet out from under her.

Part 4 contains chapters 14-18. Princess Elara takes her life back and saves what was lost, and is left with a decision to make.
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April, 2021.

The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)

The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).

The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.

The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this spring.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

 

About the Author

Jaelynn Hart is a senior attending her final semester at Florida State University. She is double majoring in Creative Writing and Media Communication Studies, and will be graduating with her Bachelor of Arts in spring 2021.

In writing this book, Hart hopes to reach out to the LGBT+ community, particularly the lesbian and bisexual community. She wants her book to allow young adults a glimpse into this world she’s created; she hopes that it will reach someone and show them that it’s okay to not know who you are just yet. Hart’s passion includes providing representation to those who need to see that they can be the hero of their story.

When she’s not writing, Hart enjoys making art in other ways; her personal favorite is painting. She also enjoys playing with her two cats, Roxie and Mason, and her dog, Patch. Hart and her fiancée enjoy cooking and traveling to new places together.

For more information, you can connect with Jaelynn Hart at jaefhart@gmail.com and at @jae.exe on Instagram.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network. Please use #ofthronesandthieves and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,


Jaelynn Hart

story:
Bref résumé

 Pour souligner le 300e anniversaire de la merveilleuse Ville de L'Assomption, notre collectif Mur/mur Création prépare un livre sur ce qui caractérise l'âme de la Ville. Parsemé de photographies, de peintures, de montages, d'illustrations et de textes, ce livre de 224 pages exige de ses trois auteurs (Julie, Anne-Marie et Arsénio) un travail colossal. Notre approche aborde les gens, les lieux et les objets qui donnent à la Ville de L'Assomption ses couleurs si particulières.

 Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

 Notre objectif étant de produire un superbe livre de style table à café, le papier et la finition sont d'une grande importance. Notre Cabaret de février nous a permis d'amasser 2500$. Il nous manque encore 2500$. En soutenant notre projet, vous obtenez de petits cadeaux exclusifs, un livre en prévente ou un traitement VIP, selon la contrepartie que vous choisissez

 L'impact

Notre démarche nous permet de rencontrer des gens fascinants, qui ouvrent grandes les portes de leurs domaines. Nous nous intéressons à l'agriculture, à la culture, à l'architecture, à l'insolite. Notre projet est une incursion dans ce que nous percevons de plus beau à L'Assomption. Nous souhaitons que notre livre laisse sa trace dans l'histoire de la Ville, même s'il ne s'agit pas d'un livre d'histoire.

Votre contribution nous permet de nous attarder à l'aspect créatif du projet et de ne pas nous inquiéter de l'aspect financier.

Nous sommes trois professionnels du domaine de l'édition, du design graphique et de la photographie.

 Risques et défis

La réussite de cette campagne nous libère d'un fardeau financier supplémentaire.

 D'autres façons d'aider

 Suivez notre page Facebook et aimez-la. Nous y publions de fréquents avis de recherche et votre participation est d'un grand secours.

Partagez notre campagne de sociofinancement avec vos amis. Informez-les de notre projet.

story:
Next Stop Bedtime

All parents want happy children, but silence is golden and its hard to have a lot of it :

  • Teaches kids responsibility using something they love, trains.
  • Gives much needed child - parent together time.
  • This book will help fill the void of diversity in children's books.
  • Gets kids to sleep earlier giving parents a bit more quiet time.

Who am I?

My name is Marco and I am an Art Director living in Richmond, VA. I am in love with all things graphic and I have been making stuff for as long as I remember. I published a book a while ago inspired by my daughter. This will allow me to continue to get my thoughts and graphic aesthetic into the world.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • I am looking for funds to self publish the book. I also want to get TShirts printed, I want to purchase hosting so I can build a website for the book.
  • By helping out with this project you will be helping both tired parents and train loving kids around the world! Kids will  get more sleep and be more healthy. Parents will get a bit more sleep potentially making them better parents. All while having a fun, responsible time.
  • If I don't reach my goal of $2000, I will use whatever funds I did receive to continue the push to get this work published.

The Impact

There have been articles written about the lack of diversity in children's books. I am working to fill that void as much as I can:

  • African American character with a universal subject that many kids from all nationalities love.
  • This will be my second publication. My first "Who am I?" has been in many stores and libraries
  • I assure you its a big deal for parents and kids alike.

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks and challenges to making a creative work. Time can become an issue because we all want our work to be perfect. And also, since its creative, there is always the challenge that someone wont like it. Its all subjective. I just have to push towards what I love. Here are some reasons I am qualified to overcome these challenges.

  • I've produced a previous children's book so I have some experience.
  • I've been working in a creative field for over 15 years. So I got thick skin.
  • Sticking to a strict(ish) schedule will help with the time aspect.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you can't contribute, doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please get the word out so that more eyes can get on the work.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
UPDATE: Any Contributions made after the $8k goal will be donated to Pōhāhāikalani in Waipiʻo Valley, Hawaiʻi. Please check out their website to learn more about them: https://www.pohahaikalani.com/

 

The Story of My Book


Return to Pō is a series of essays about my young adult life in Hawaiʻi. I left the familiar home of my upbringing behind to confront a innate desire to explore the source of life and its purpose. This brought me to Hawaiʻi, one of the remotest places on Earth, and even beyond to the uninhabited island of Kure Atoll. This is a coming-of-age story, a collection of personal essays weaved together to unravel some of humanity's greatest questions: Who are we? Where did we come from? And where are we going?

My name is Jon-Erik Jardine and I am the author of Return to Pō. I was compelled to write this book because throughout my life I have been sensing a kind of crisis of meaning in our modern world. I have become concerned about the growing disconnect between people and nature and spiritual malnourishment. In a secularizing world where our relationship to each other and the world is occuring more and more through technological interface, we are losing the embodied experience of who we are and what we are.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the connection we as humans share with nature, and what this connection can teach us about being human. To be human is to observe the universe both within and without, unbound by the limitations of a singular point of view. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to dive deeper into topics on death, personal identity, adulthood, and social responsibility, and how what truly informs us about these topics can be found in a more-than-human world.

In this book, you'll encounter multifaceted dimensions of Rites of Passage and environmentalism through narratives like:

  • Departure and Arrivals - A shrinking team faces a growing problem when a heatwave strikes on a tiny wildlife refuge in the middle of the pacific ocean.
  • Death of Our Lives - An attempt to introduce a population of endangered ducks faces unforeseen challenges that illuminates how precious life is.
  • Answering the Call - When death hits and we slip out of the world, how do we return to the living? In this essay, I face the greatest challenge of my life, realizing everything I have learned has prepared me for this moment.

You will love this book if you are:
  • fascinated by the natural world and your place in it.
  • interested in the permeability of identity and the path toward becoming one’s own self.
  • interested in what it is like to live on an uninhabited island with six other people for half year at a time, and what effect this can have on a person’s perspective of humans and the world at large.

Ultimately, I hope that Return to Pō inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
  • What does it mean to mature into a true adult?
  • What can we learn about our role in society from an other-than-human world?
  • What can we learn about the modern world from an ancient past?

I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. Coming together and discussing what a connection to nature has to do with our relationship and responsibility to the world will change us all for the better.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • My editor and I will work together to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish!


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and some additional sections of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

Jon-Erik Jardine is a Gardener at the Woodland Park Zoo and a Graduate Student at Miami University where he is pursuing his Master’s in Biology of Arts. His passion for Nature and Human Development lead him to pursue experiences that would deepen his own understanding of what it means to be human beyond the bounds of society.

Jardine spent five years in Hawai’i, working as a counselor, teacher, and remote habitat restorationist. In 2018, while teaching highschool English in Hilo, his life was uprooted with the death of his younger brother. Realizing a fundamental change had occurred, Jardine began reflecting on the precious values of life and a reverence for the wisdom of death. He now lives close with his family in Seattle.

When he’s not writing, studying for school, or tending to his plants at work, Jon-Erik is training for his love of ultra trail-running in the Cascade Mountains.

For more information you can connect with Jon-Erik at jonerik.jardine@gmail.com, @ecopsychology_project and @JonErikJardine , and LinkedIn.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #returntopo and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Jon-Erik

I was compelled to write this book because throughout my life I have been sensing a kind of crisis of meaning in our modern world. I have become concerned about the growing disconnect between people and nature and spiritual malnourishment. In a secularizing world where our relationship to each other and the world is occuring more and more through technological interface, we are losing the embodied experience of who we are and what we are.My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover the connection we as humans share with nature, and what this connection can teach us about being human. To be human is to observe the universe both within and without, unbound by the limitations of a singular point of view. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to dive deeper into topics on death, personal identity, adulthood, and social responsibility, and how what truly informs us about these topics can be found in a more-than-human world.In this book, you'll encounter multifaceted dimensions of Rites of Passage and environmentalism through narratives like:


Departure and Arrivals - A shrinking team faces a growing problem when a heatwave strikes on a tiny wildlife refuge in the middle of the pacific ocean.

Death of Our Lives - An attempt to introduce a population of endangered ducks faces unforeseen challenges that illuminates how precious life is.

Answering the Call - When death hits and we slip out of the world, how do we return to the living? In this essay, I face the greatest challenge of my life, realizing everything I have learned has prepared me for this moment.

You will love this book if you are:
fascinated by the natural world and your place in it.
interested in the permeability of identity and the path toward becoming one’s own self.
interested in what it is like to live on an uninhabited island with six other people for half year at a time, and what effect this can have on a person’s perspective of humans and the world at large.

Ultimately, I hope that Return to Pō inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:
What does it mean to mature into a true adult?
What can we learn about our role in society from an other-than-human world?
What can we learn about the modern world from an ancient past?

I really look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. Coming together and discussing what a connection to nature has to do with our relationship and responsibility to the world will change us all for the better.
 
What I Need & What You'll Get This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
My editor and I will work together to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020
The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish!
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish

A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
Early access to the Introduction of my Book and some additional sections of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share the experiences of writing my book
And more...

About the Author
Jon-Erik Jardine is a Gardener at the Woodland Park Zoo and a Graduate Student at Miami University where he is pursuing his Master’s in Biology of Arts. His passion for Nature and Human Development lead him to pursue experiences that would deepen his own understanding of what it means to be human beyond the bounds of society.Jardine spent five years in Hawai’i, working as a counselor, teacher, and remote habitat restorationist. In 2018, while teaching highschool English in Hilo, his life was uprooted with the death of his younger brother. Realizing a fundamental change had occurred, Jardine began reflecting on the precious values of life and a reverence for the wisdom of death. He now lives close with his family in Seattle.When he’s not writing, studying for school, or tending to his plants at work, Jon-Erik is training for his love of ultra trail-running in the Cascade Mountains.For more information you can connect with Jon-Erik at jonerik.jardine@gmail.com, @ecopsychology_project and @JonErikJardine , and LinkedIn.
 
Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 
Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #returntopo and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.
Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Jon-Erik

story:
Story of My Book

The Unorthodox Creator is a book about the fast-evolving digital world and how we cannot only survive but also thrive in this new world.

My name is Derron Payne and I am the author of The Unorthodox Creator. I wrote this book because the pandemic accelerated the growth of the already fast-changing digital world and I wanted to address that and help others take advantage of this.

My hope is that in reading this book, you will see the importance of picking up on trends and looking to the future. In this book, I hope to instill in you the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for how fast the digital world changes and evolves and affects everything around it. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help guide you through this new world.

In this book, you'll learn about content creators and how they managed to change the world and how it all typically started with consistently creating some form of content. You'll hear stories such as...
  • How a YouTuber named Mr. Beast created a restaurant with no physical locations to sit down and eat yet still managed to be super successful.
  • How a few YouTubers like The Paul Brothers managed to take on the boxing world and are selling more pay per views than career boxers.
  • How a YouTuber who goes by the name DDG managed to a become a platinum recording artist.
You will love this book if you enjoy looking toward the future, exploring new opportunities, or are intrigued by the rapid growth of social media.

The Unorthodox Creator is a nonfiction book that speaks to anyone that is interested in how fast the digital world changes and evolves, or if you just enjoy interesting and entertaining stories. It also speaks to entrepreneurs or business executives who want to look at ways for their company to stay ahead of the curve.
 

The Book - The Unorthodox Creator

The book is written in 4 parts.

Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-2. It is all about how we got here and the backstory on this fast-evolving digital world.

Part 2 contains chapters 4-7. It is a comparison between principles of old media versus new media mindsets. 

Part 3 contains chapters 8-10. It is about building a new world mindset and how we can do that.  

Part 4 contains chapters 11-15. How can we succeed in this new world? 
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

  • This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Winter.
  • I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

About the Author

Born in Brooklyn, NY, Derron Payne attended Rockland Community College as an honor student, where he received his associate's degree before moving to McDonough School of Business at Georgetown University for a bachelor's degree focusing on Management and Marketing. He previously co-founded the award winning start-up, SmallTalk, before moving on to new ventures. 

Payne now serves as the CEO of The Art of the Pivot LLC, a company born from the book that he previously wrote and published back in 2019, The Art of the Pivot. 

He always had a passion for technology and the internet, probably because as he grew, so did it. The pandemic accelerating the growth of this digital world piqued Derron’s curiosity and lit a fire under his passion for creation. This passion led to the birth of this new idea that is The Unorthodox Creator. 

It is almost funny to think that at this point he once hated writing. Now, Derron is on his way to being a two-time published author with the launch of The Unorthodox Creator.

For more information you can connect with Derron at dp839@georgetown.edu or on social media - 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/derron.payne.7
Instagram: www.instagram.com/derronpayne/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/derrondpayne
 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks

Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)

Use this form https://forms.gle/gHcG4A8ehL7QSETB6 to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!
I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit.)

Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.

When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry! 

Please use #TheUnorthodoxCreator and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!
Tag: 
Instagram - @derronpayne / @newdegreepress
Facebook - @derron.payne.7 / @NewDegreePress 
Twitter - @derrondpayne / @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Derron Payne

story:
dear reader, 

On the first day of May, I learned that I've been accepted to one of 60 spots at the Ashbery Home School. It's a weeklong summer poetry conference in Hudson, NY including workshops, readings and more--I'll study with poets including Myung Mi Kim, Harryette Mullen, Brian Blanchfield, Adam Fitzgerald, Douglas Kearney, Simone White, CAConrad and Jorie Graham. This is a dream come true, and an incredibly exciting opportunity. 

I need to send in my tuition of $1175 by June 1st to confirm my attendance. I'm a recent graduate of Bennington College, complete with student loans to start paying back, and I currently work as an Americorps volunteer reading tutor. In other words, this is a lot of money for me. I'm asking for your help to make this experience attainable.

If you can, please consider donating--I've dreamed up some 'perks' which are mostly poems and other written things that I can send you in the mail. If you'd love to help but can't do so financially (which is how I usually feel when I read these things, so I get it!!), please do share this campaign to Facebook, email, carrier pigeon, the radio, or whatever seems most appropriate to you. Anything helps, and I'm so glad to have your support in any way possible.

 

Thank you, thank you, thank you for reading-- and I hope, wherever (and whoever) you are, that you're having a lovely day. 

--Joely Byron Lipson Barber

story:
i have had the misfortune of meeting and welcoming into my life individuals that wrote my relationship guidebook for me. this guidebook was full of all the things relationships should never be; abuse, rape, confinement, and isolation. it wasn’t written all at once. one person wrote a chapter and months later the next chapter was written by another. so on and so on until the pages were full and i couldn’t find my way out. i began to think that this was the normality of relationships and without a thriving relationship to look up to, i actively sought out people who would continue this pattern of learned behavior.

that was until i reconnected with the person i’d been in love with since the day i met him. through him i began to rewrite my guidebook. i began to understand what i learned as normal was neither normal nor acceptable. i began to recognize what it was to be respected, trusted, seen, and loved.

while he fostered this growth and change within me, he couldn’t see any of the good and beauty in himself. i set out to write this book not only as my confession to him of my past and my feelings for him, but to remind him how amazing and exquisite he is and how beneficially he impacts all those whom his light touches.

originally intended for this specific person in my life, but has become larger than that. written to anyone who doesn’t see themselves in the same beautiful light as we see them, doesn’t see the good they deserve, and the bad they don’t. to those of us who can’t see what others see, keep shinning that light. someone wonderful is searching for you in the vast dark universe.

story:
Hi, my name is Jan Kotouč. I am an author of thirteen novels published in the Czech Republic by Fantom Print and Brokilon. My genre is sci-fi and also alternate history. Several of my books have become bestsellers and won several awards.

I am a fairly successful and established author in the Czech Republic, but I have decided to expand and move to the English-speaking market. I have hired a translator and with the blessing of my publishers, my novels will be available in both printed and electronic versions.

And here is where I need your help. I need your help raising money to translate my books into English. I already have a very talented translator who I work with, but I need your support.

You might – rightfully – ask yourself why support an author like me since there are dime a dozen sci-fi authors out there. That’s a very good question.   I have attached the first few chapters from my novel in a link at the bottom of this page, so you can look at them and see if you like my novel . Another reason to support me is that one of the rewards is the option to include you in my novel. Would you like to have a character named after yourself? No problem. Is a character too small for you? How about a planet named in your honor?Or a big corporation, or a ship? Or, you can have a whole novel dedicated to you.

Thank you and I have complete trust in you.

 

FAQ

What will happen if you don’t collect all the money?

I will still be able to pay some of the expenses and I’ll give rewards to everyone who’s donated. That’s why I’ve chosen Indiegogo. I will still give all perks to the backers.

Isn’t the target amount too small?

It probably is, then again, I’m also financing the translation partially myself, it would not seem fair to ask only for your contribution and be unwilling to contribute anything myself.

What will happen if you’ll collect more money than the target amount?

It depends on how much more it’d be. Depending on the amount, I can give extra goals, like hiring an extra translator to start working on another series of mine.

Why hire a translator? Can’t you translate it yourself?

I probably can, I’ve translated several shorter works of mine. But I am also a professional writer, I need to write new stories, not only because I can then publish them, but because that’s my passion. If I were to translate it, it would take away from the time I could use to write instead.

If I get a character named after me, how will it be included in the book since you are translating a book that is already finished and published in different language?

I constantly write new books and there’ll always be room for names. Also every book of mine has many secondary and tertiary characters and it’s no problem to change some of the names in a different language edition. Translators often change names of characters and places if they have some special meaning in a given language. This is similar.

Is Czech sci-fi different from the mainstream English-language sci-fi?

I think every author is different and has a different approach to things. But in the end, every story is about people and that’s universal. I don’t consider myself to be a Czech writer, I consider myself to be a science fiction writer.Or just a writer.

Is publishing online through Amazon better than traditional publishing?

It’s not mutually exclusive, many successful writers have traditional publishers and have their older out-of-print books up on Amazon. Or they‘ve started on Amazon and then been picked up by traditional publishers. Once you have the text in English, the sky is the limit.

Do you think your books can make it through as an „indie“?

The hard truth is that 99 % of all independent books published on Amazon are not successful and they sell a few dozen copies.

My advantage is that I’m not a newbie. I’ve written thirteen novels, plus many novellas and short stories on the Czech market with traditional publishers Brokilon and Fantom Print (who also publish Czech editions of books by Jack Campbell, Larry Correia, Marko Kloos, Robert Jordan, Patricia Briggs or John Ringo). All of my latest books have become bestsellers on the Czech market.

Czech authors also often need to do their own marketing and I have experience with that side of the publishing as well.

Story synopsis - Frontiers of the Imperium

 

Daniel Hankerson is genetically enhanced member of the royal family but rather than family fortune and influence, he always rather relied on his ability to evaluate people, which helps him during his work for naval intelligence and also while playing cards. This ability now tells him that something is in the air when he almost become a victim of an attempted murder and the upcoming mission to the fringes of the Imperium does not give him a good feeling. The more they talk about how it is just a routine test of a brand new communication ship, the more suspicious it is.

Central Imperium is too big, too fragile and holds together by too many compromises. External enemies are about to také a bit of its territory but the internal ones are even more dangerous.

Sample chapters:
Frontiers of the Imperium
http://www.jan-kotouc.cz/frontiers-of-the-imper...
Sun Does Not Set Over the Czech Lands
http://www.jan-kotouc.cz/sun-does-not-set-over-...

I will still be able to pay some of the expenses and I’ll give rewards to everyone who’s donated. That’s why I’ve chosen Indiegogo. I will still give all perks to the backers.
Isn’t the target amount too small?
It probably is, then again, I’m also financing the translation partially myself, it would not seem fair to ask only for your contribution and be unwilling to contribute anything myself.
What will happen if you’ll collect more money than the target amount?
It depends on how much more it’d be. Depending on the amount, I can give extra goals, like hiring an extra translator to start working on another series of mine.
Why hire a translator? Can’t you translate it yourself?
I probably can, I’ve translated several shorter works of mine. But I am also a professional writer, I need to write new stories, not only because I can then publish them, but because that’s my passion. If I were to translate it, it would take away from the time I could use to write instead.
If I get a character named after me, how will it be included in the book since you are translating a book that is already finished and published in different language?
I constantly write new books and there’ll always be room for names. Also every book of mine has many secondary and tertiary characters and it’s no problem to change some of the names in a different language edition. Translators often change names of characters and places if they have some special meaning in a given language. This is similar.
Is Czech sci-fi different from the mainstream English-language sci-fi?
I think every author is different and has a different approach to things. But in the end, every story is about people and that’s universal. I don’t consider myself to be a Czech writer, I consider myself to be a science fiction writer.Or just a writer.
Is publishing online through Amazon better than traditional publishing?
It’s not mutually exclusive, many successful writers have traditional publishers and have their older out-of-print books up on Amazon. Or they‘ve started on Amazon and then been picked up by traditional publishers. Once you have the text in English, the sky is the limit.
Do you think your books can make it through as an „indie“?
The hard truth is that 99 % of all independent books published on Amazon are not successful and they sell a few dozen copies.
My advantage is that I’m not a newbie. I’ve written thirteen novels, plus many novellas and short stories on the Czech market with traditional publishers Brokilon and Fantom Print (who also publish Czech editions of books by Jack Campbell, Larry Correia, Marko Kloos, Robert Jordan, Patricia Briggs or John Ringo). All of my latest books have become bestsellers on the Czech market.
Czech authors also often need to do their own marketing and I have experience with that side of the publishing as well.Story synopsis - Frontiers of the Imperium
 
Daniel Hankerson is genetically enhanced member of the royal family but rather than family fortune and influence, he always rather relied on his ability to evaluate people, which helps him during his work for naval intelligence and also while playing cards. This ability now tells him that something is in the air when he almost become a victim of an attempted murder and the upcoming mission to the fringes of the Imperium does not give him a good feeling. The more they talk about how it is just a routine test of a brand new communication ship, the more suspicious it is.
Central Imperium is too big, too fragile and holds together by too many compromises. External enemies are about to také a bit of its territory but the internal ones are even more dangerous.Sample chapters:Frontiers of the Imperiumhttp://www.jan-kotouc.cz/frontiers-of-the-imper...Sun Does Not Set Over the Czech Landshttp://www.jan-kotouc.cz/sun-does-not-set-over-...

story:
Objetivo:

APPLAF lidera junto a otras organizaciones y asociaciones de tiro deportivo y caza del Perú una campaña para detener el efecto nocivo de las recientes normativas que regulan las armas de fuego de uso civil en sus diferentes modalidades.

En ese sentido, y a fin de defender los derechos de los propietarios y usuarios legales de armas de fuego en el Perú, es imperativo iniciar una campaña de acciones legales que invaliden esta normativa por considerarse inconstitucional y atentatoria contra los derechos consagrados en la Constitución del país.

Las acciones legales que se consideran – y que deberán implementarse a la brevedad posible – incluyen (a) Acción Popular; (b) Acción de Amparo -a presentarse de manera individual-; (c) Acción de Inconstitucionalidad de la Ley – para lo cual se requieren aproximadamente 10mil firmas; y (d) Demanda ante INDECOPI por los elevados costos de los trámites que nos afectan como usuarios.

SU DONACIÓN HARÁ POSIBLE QUE DEFENDAMOS EL DERECHO DE LOS PERUANOS A LA LEGITIMA DEFENSA Y EL DERECHO A LA PROPIEDAD.
COLABORE HOY MISMO!

¿Dónde Donar?

Usted puede donar en este sitio de internet o haciendo su depósito a la Cuenta Corriente especialmente abierta para este fondo en el Banco de Crédito del Perú (BCP)

Cuenta del Banco de Credito del Peru 193-22617774-0-34
Para transferencias desde otros bancos, el código de cuenta interbancaria es:

002 193-122617774034 17

Por favor enviar copia del voucher de depósito al correo electrónico: informes@applaf.org indicándonos que ha hecho esta donación.

Desde Fuera del Perú

Si Usted es un ciudadano de cualquiera de los países Latinoamericanos le pedimos también su colaboración. Los grupos desarmistas vienen operando en cada uno de nuestros países y en estos momentos se debate normas similares en diversos países. La experiencia peruana puede ayudar a prevenir que esto suceda en su propio país. Por favor haganos llegar su donación a través de este site y refiéranos a sus amigos.

Actualización: 30/05

APPLAF hace un llamado a todos los usuarios legales a que DE MANERA INMEDIATA consulten con un abogado y presenten sus acciones de amparo en los diversos juzgados civiles de provincias o en el distrito judicial de Lima. Copia del patron de amparo puede descargarlo en este link: (por favor consulte con un abogado antes de presentar su accion de amparo.)

www.applaf.org/patron_amparo_applaf.doc

Actualización: 07/05

Muchas gracias a todos los que estan haciendo sus aportes en el Banco de Credito del Peru! Vamos avanzando… por favor, animar a todos sus amigos y familiares a hacer sus donaciones.

EL FONDO LEGAL DE APPLAF NOS DEFIENDE A TODOS!!!

Actualizacion 09/095

Una recopilación de las noticias publicadas en los diferentes medio. Cortesía de LimaGuns

http://www.limaguns.com/noticias/ver/6/compilacion-de-noticias-sobre-nueva-ley-de-armas-y-prohibicion-9mm

 

Justificación:

Recientemente, el Gobierno Peruano publicó el Decreto Supremo 006-2013-IN (Sábado 13 de Abril de 2013), que reglamenta la ley No. 29954 publicada el 4 de Diciembre del 2012 a través del cual se norma la fabricación, comercio, posesión y uso por particulares de armas y municiones que no son de guerra.  La Asociación Peruana de Propietarios Legales de Armas de Fuego (APPLAF) ha hecho conocer su más enérgico rechazo a esta inconstitucional medida y lidera un esfuerzo, junto a otras organizaciones y asociaciones de tiro deportivo y caza del Perú, para impedir que las medidas que se describen en esta normativa se hagan efectivas.

En resumen, la normativa hace dificilísimo que los ciudadanos puedan adquirir armas legalmente, a la vez que disuade a los que tienen licencias de renovarlas, arrojándolos a la informalidad (Rospigliosi 2013). Adicionalmente:

  • Se reduce la vigencia de las licencias de uso de armas de cinco a un año calendario.
  • Se reduce a 2 armas por persona para defensa personal, 2 armas por persona para deporte (2 por modalidad) y  2 armas por persona para caza.
  • Se prohíbe el uso de armas de calibre 9 mm Luger o Parabellum, obligando a transferirlos a miembros de las Fuerzas Armadas y Policía Nacional en actividad, en un plazo de 180 días calendario, debiendo entregar a la SUCAMEC sus armas en custodia hasta la transferencia. (Castañeda 2013).

El gobierno con un mero DS, atenta contra el derecho a la PROPIEDAD, consagrado por nuestra Constitución; el gobierno quiere obligar a muchos ciudadanos peruanos, propietarios de armas legales, con licencias vigentes emitidas por la anterior DICSCAMEC que certifican su propiedad, a vender sus bienes en un plazo de 180 días; incluso en el caso de pistolas calibre 9mm Luger o PB, sólo se pueden transferir a miembros de las fuerzas armadas o policiales en actividad. y mientras se venden, el gobierno quiere que entreguemos nuestras armas a la SUCAMEC para que las guarden en “custodia”, cuando es conocido que armas depositadas en estos almacenes, se pierden, les cambian piezas o acaban en manos de delincuentes.

El Gobierno Peruano está vulnerando el principio de la seguridad jurídica al pretender desconocer y anular licencias legalmente emitidas con anterioridad a este absurdo DS. La supuesta obligación de venderles las pistolas 9mm Luger solo a miembros de las fuerzas armadas o policiales, vulnera la libertad de contratar, al obligar a algunos usuarios legales a vender su propiedad a un reducido grupo, a precios que por la necesidad, podrían ser irrisorios.

El gobierno con un simple DS atenta contra el derecho a la igualdad ante la ley, pues ahora obtener una licencia, se debe justificar documentariamente la necesidad de su obtención; es decir, nosotros debemos de documentar que el gobierno es incapaz de defender a sus ciudadanos y por eso necesitamos un arma de defensa. También debemos documentar la necesidad de practicar cualquier deporte de tiro, o la necesidad de practicar la caza deportiva. Personas de bajos recursos, que no pueden documentar estas necesidades, son discriminadas por esta nueva ley y su reglamento.

El gobierno con este DS ha incluido como armas (y por lo tanto hay que tramitar licencias) las neumáticas y las eléctricas. Las carabinas de aire comprimido y los aparatos de shock eléctrico, ahora para ser legales, deben de tener licencia, lo que implica sacar certificados de antecedentes penales, judiciales y policiales, certificado de salud mental (que ahora no solo será psicológico sino también psiquiátrico, y solo será emitido por centros de salud públicos) y perder horas en el engorroso y complicado trámite en la SUCAMEC.  

¿Dónde adquieren los delincuentes sus armas para sus fechorías? ¿de dónde sacan fusiles AKM, FAL, granadas, pistolas y chalecos antibalas? del mercado negro,  el cual se abastece con armas de contrabando, con armas producto de delitos, armas no registradas, armas alquiladas o vendidas por algunos malos miembros de la Policía Nacional y Fuerzas Armadas (Castañeda 2013).

¿Será que el objetivo es otro, inconfesable  por lo que esconde, como viene ocurriendo en Venezuela, Ecuador y Argentina? ¿No será que el verdadero propósito es desarmar a la población civil pensante, digna, democrática y cumplidora de la ley? (Couturier 2013)

¿Qué es APPLAF?

APPLAF es una asociación sin fines de lucro establecida el 17 de Enero, 2012 y registrada en los Registros Públicos de Lima Asiento No. 12820437 cuyos principales objetivos son promover la Educación en el uso Correcto, Legal, Seguro y Responsable de las armas de fuego de uso civil; abogar por una legislación favorable que preserve el derecho a la propiedad; y vigilar y de ser posible participar activamente en los procesos judiciales que se deriven del uso legítimo de armas de fuego para salvaguardar la garantía del debido proceso.

 

Referencias:

Castañeda, Mateo. Reforma en Peor en la Legislación de Armas de Fuego. Artículo de Opinión. Asociaciones de Caza del Perú.

Couturier, Hernán. Armando al Enemigo. . Artículo de Opinión. Asociaciones de Caza del Perú.

Rospigliosi, Fernando. Ayudando a la Delincuencia. Artículo de Opinión. Diario el Comercio 04.23.2013
